___array_string_enum.description: array input with items type and enum properties set

___array_string.description: array input with items type property set to string

___string_color.description: string input with color format property set

___array_object.description: array input with items type property set to object

___string_default.description: string input with default property set

___string_enum.description: string input with enum and default properties set

___number_default.description: number input with default property set

___string_minlength_maxlength.description: string input with minLength and maxLength properties set

___integer_maximum.description: integer input with maximum property set

___string_date.description: string input with date format property set

___string_textarea.description: string input rendered as textarea due to form definition

___string_enum_default.description: string input with enum and default properties set

___string_datetime.description: string input with date-time format property set

___number_minimum_maximum.description: number input with both minimum and maximum properties set
